list.name: SalesForce dashboard
list.description: Visualise data about accounts, lead, opportunities and sales.

list.name: Stock portfolio
list.description: Input your stock portfolio and watch as Omniscope maps the fields and produces a cool dashboard

list.name: Stocks performance
list.description: Input some stock tickers and analyse their performance over time.

parameters.name: Tickers
parameters.description: Enter stock tickers comma separated i.e. aapl,meta,hsbc

parameters.name: Start Date
parameters.description: Number of months. E.g. 3 to get last 3 months, 6 for last 6 months, etc.
